ComicInfo.Penciller: Steve Pugh,David Lynch,Cosey,Rick Geary,Didier Comès,Phil Elliott,David Lynch,Cosey,Rick Geary,Didier Comès,Phil Elliott
ComicInfo.Summary:
Schizophrenia isn't all it's cracked up to be, as we find out in the concluding chapter of "Tree-Heart", by Comes. This issue also features the premiere of "In Search of Peter Pan" by Cosey, whose beautiful linework has already graced the pages of Cheval Noir in "Voyage to Italy". Plus, "Post-Apocalypse" by Phil Elliott, "Secrets of the Laundry" from the inimitable Rick Geary, and postmodern humor in David Lynch's "The Angriest Dog in the World". Cover painting by Steve Pugh (Hellblazer, Grimjack).
*Story Titles* The Angriest Dog in the World In Search of Peter Pan Chapter 1 Secrets of the Laundry Tree-Heart Chapter 8 Post-Apocalypse
